properties.name: rabbit.exchange
properties.description: Exchange name - overridden by exchangeNameExpression, if supplied.

properties.name: rabbit.exchangeExpression
properties.description: A SpEL expression that evaluates to an exchange name.

properties.name: rabbit.routingKey
properties.description: Routing key - overridden by routingKeyExpression, if supplied.

properties.name: rabbit.routingKeyExpression
properties.description: A SpEL expression that evaluates to a routing key.

properties.name: rabbit.persistentDeliveryMode
properties.description: Default delivery mode when 'amqp_deliveryMode' header is not present, true for PERSISTENT.

properties.name: rabbit.converterBeanName
properties.description: The bean name for a custom message converter; if omitted, a SimpleMessageConverter is used. If 'jsonConverter', a Jackson2JsonMessageConverter bean will be created for you.

properties.name: rabbit.ownConnection
properties.description: When true, use a separate connection based on the boot properties.

properties.name: rabbit.headersMappedLast
properties.description: When mapping headers for the outbound message, determine whether the headers are mapped before the message is converted, or afterwards.
